Name: Md Shahwaz Akhter

SUMMARY: 
 
 1.6 + years of Information Technology experience in the field of software 
development, maintenance and support of web based and standalone 
applications developed on ASP.NET MVC platform with SQL as the back end 
database.

core .NET, C#, Angular JS and ASP.NET MVC as the technological base. 
 
 Experience in working with database like MySQL and proficiency in writing the 
SQL query 
 
 Experience in different phase of SDLC including Analysis, implementation and 
testing during the development of software applications 
 
 Experience in application servers like Internet Information Services (IIS). 
 
 Ability to learn and adapt quickly to the emerging new technologies and 
paradigms

Institution Of Electronics And Telecommunication Engineers, New Delhi, 
India (Scored 62.22%).

Project overview: 
We Developed a ERP Solution by Using the available latest technologies and upgrading

of administration, Accounting and inventory through the customization that required 
by the clients. It is ensuring the implementation of solution that will exactly want.
